text: Her kied on þise iwrite þat hich luuig bischop at mine fuyrsiþe wram crediton hi ministre to þare cherche of examchestre for mire leue broþeren to hwreyprighe at mine outganhes iuasnede þay geuenisse þat egger þe luf minetheude bischop bitende into cridiamtones ministre and heg þat alle oþere bischopes sidþe of mine dages were igeue and bigite of oþer bischopes hek hich habbe out igadere of bokes fale.
And ido in on oþe masseboc at sainte marie weuede togadre hi broght þar ma hit schel i su.
And in on oþer boke þat hatte penitencialis bodde to hourde and ich hit itrimde mid on hondreit dages of bute ende and ich on cursie þat hit oþeruise isette, and hek alle þare churcha yvo.
